verbose_text: Similarly, for both models, we extended previous data and showed overexpression of Klrc1 (NKG2A), Klrg1 (KLRG1), Klre1, Klra1 (Ly-49c), and Klrk1 (Nkg2d) in the expanded responses and unique expression of Ly49C mRNA, confirmed by flow cytometry analysis or qPCR (data not shown).
evidence: overexpression of Klrc1 (NKG2A), Klrg1 (KLRG1), Klre1, Klra1 (Ly-49c), and Klrk1
